snippet: In a telethon to raise money for the American Red Cross after Hurricane Sandy, Bruce Springsteen, Jon Bon Jovi, Mary J. Blige and others local and far-flung proffered encouragement to storm victims.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews NBC's telethon Hurricane Sandy: Coming Together, to raise money for the American Red Cross; notes Bruce Springsteen, Billy Joel, Jon Bon Jovi, Sting were among the musicians offering encouragement to storm victims.
lead_paragraph: In a telethon to raise money for the American Red Cross after Hurricane Sandy, Bruce Springsteen, Jon Bon Jovi, Mary J. Blige and others local and far-flung proffered encouragement to storm victims.

headline.print_headline: Songs of Sympathy and Endurance, From Voices Touched by Hurricane
headline.seo: Songs of Sympathy on NBC’s Hurricane Sandy Telethon
headline.main: Songs of Sympathy and Endurance, From Voices Touched by Hurricane
